text: Beu tapeuingat dum manusia Keu uroe teuka azeub that leupah Awak nyang lalem jikheun uroe nyan Wahe Po kamoe bek Neupeubagah Neubri meutanggoh hana peue trep that Meujak ibadat turot peurintah Peue nyang Droeuneuh yue ngat kamoe pubuet Rasul meuikot peue nyang geupeugah Kon ka lheuh takheun yoh dilee masa Lon han binasa ka tameusumpah
